item.title: Paralyzed by all the changes you want to make
item.description: "It doesn't matter which side of the fence you get off on sometimes. What matters most is getting off. You cannot make progress without making decisions.

item.title: The Fundamental Option of being who I AM: Happiness Formula Part III
item.description: The final part in a series on the popular Happiness Formula.
